CustomField.description: Processing State for the Product Line record. Shows whether the record has been processed to the Sales/User facing objects, is Backlog and will be processed later or Error when processing errored.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Processing State for the Product Line record. Shows whether the record has been processed to the Sales/User facing objects, is Backlog and will be processed later or Error when processing errored.
CustomField.label: Processing State
